vote.title: Authorize a five-year master agreement for the purchase of various types of air valves and parts for the Dallas Water Utilities Department - Municipal Valve & Equipment Company, Inc., lowest responsible bidder of two - Estimated amount of $462,600.00 - Financing:  Dallas Water Utilities Fund
